overview.en: YFTC(Yi Fa Temple Coin) is unlike traditional electronic business platform distribution points. YFTC is a block chain technology generated by a cryptographic digital currency, with real, tamper-proof, privacy protection, process transparency and other capabilities. Each YFTC is protected by a cryptography right, and it can be freely circulated in the network for payment and transfer.
overview.zh: YFTC全称孝网商城孝币积分，简称YFTC，不同于传统电商平台发行的积分，只是可控制的数字，YFTC是由区块链技术生成的一种加密数字货币，具有真实、防篡改、保护隐私、过程透明等能力，每一个YFTC都是由密码学保护的一份权利，并且可以在网络中自由流通，支付，转账。
